quotes.title: Fishing
quotes.quote: Fishing relaxes me. It’s like yoga, except I still get to kill something.

quotes.title: Too chummy
quotes.quote: When people get a little too chummy with me I like to call them by the wrong name to let them know I don’t really care about them.

quotes.title: Don't Care
quotes.quote: The less I know about other people’s affairs, the happier I am. I’m not interested in caring about people. I once worked with a guy for three years and never learned his name. Best friend I ever had. We still never talk sometimes.
